thm ecopover(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ c0[Er](c1 × c1)
  ⊣ c0 = { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈(c1 × c1)∧ s1 ∈(c1 × c1))∧ ∃(s2, ∃(s3, ∃(s4, ∃(s5,((s0 = < s2, s3 > ∧ s1 = < s4, s5 >)∧(s2[c2]s5)=(s3[c2]s4)))))))}
  ⊣ (s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0)
  ⊣ ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→(s0[c2]s1)∈ c1)
  ⊣ ((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2))
  ⊣ ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→((s0[c2]s1)=(s0[c2]s2)→ s1 = s2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s5)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s5)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s5)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s3, s5)
  ⊣ d(s4, s5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c2)
  ⊣ d(s4, c1)
  ⊣ d(s4, c2)
  ⊣ d(s5, c1)
  ⊣ d(s5, c2)
} = {
  iseri(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, (c1 × c1))
  relopabi(s0, s1, c0, ((s0 ∈(c1 × c1)∧ s1 ∈(c1 × c1))∧ ∃(s2, ∃(s3, ∃(s4, ∃(s5,((s0 = < s2, s3 > ∧ s1 = < s4, s5 >)∧(s2[c2]s5)=(s3[c2]s4))))))))
  ecopovsym(s0, s1, s2, s3, s4, s5, hs0, c0, hs1, c1, c2)
  ecopovtrn(s0, s1, s2, s3, s4, s5, hs0, c0, hs1, hs2, c1, c2)
  impbii(hs0 ∈(c1 × c1), hs0[c0]hs0)
  rspec(hs0, (c1 × c1), hs0[c0]hs0)
  mpbir(∀(hs0 ∈(c1 × c1), hs0[c0]hs0), ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, ∀(hs2 ∈ c1, < hs1, hs2 >[c0]< hs1, hs2 >)))
  rgen2a(hs1, hs2, c1, < hs1, hs2 >[c0]< hs1, hs2 >)
  anidms((hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1), < hs1, hs2 >[c0]< hs1, hs2 >)
  mpbiri(((hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1)∧(hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1)), < hs1, hs2 >[c0]< hs1, hs2 >, (hs1[c2]hs2)=(hs2[c2]hs1))
  caovcom(s0, s1, hs1, c2, hs2)
  vex(hs1)
  vex(hs2)
  ecopoveq(s0, s1, s2, s3, s4, s5, hs1, c1, hs2, hs1, hs2, c0, c2)
  ralxp(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, c1, hs0[c0]hs0, < hs1, hs2 >[c0]< hs1, hs2 >)
  anidms(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 >, (hs0[c0]hs0 ↔ < hs1, hs2 >[c0]< hs1, hs2 >))
  breq12(hs0, < hs1, hs2 >, hs0, < hs1, hs2 >, c0)
  syl(hs0[c0]hs0, hs0 ∈(c1 × c1), hs0[((c1 × c1)×(c1 × c1))]hs0)
  ssbri(hs0, c0, hs0, ((c1 × c1)×(c1 × c1)))
  eqsstri(c0, ((c1 × c1)×(c1 × c1)), { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈(c1 × c1)∧ s1 ∈(c1 × c1))∧ ∃(s2, ∃(s3, ∃(s4, ∃(s5,((s0 = < s2, s3 > ∧ s1 = < s4, s5 >)∧(s2[c2]s5)=(s3[c2]s4)))))))})
  opabssxp(s0, s1, (c1 × c1), (c1 × c1), ∃(s2, ∃(s3, ∃(s4, ∃(s5,((s0 = < s2, s3 > ∧ s1 = < s4, s5 >)∧(s2[c2]s5)=(s3[c2]s4)))))))
  simplbi(hs0[((c1 × c1)×(c1 × c1))]hs0, hs0 ∈(c1 × c1), hs0 ∈(c1 × c1))
  brxp(hs0, (c1 × c1), (c1 × c1), hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c1 × c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s3, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s3, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s3)
  diff.cv.s(s3, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s3, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s3)
  diff.cv.s(s4, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s4, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s4)
  diff.cv.s(s4, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s4, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s4)
  diff.cv.s(s5, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s5, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s5)
  diff.cv.s(s5, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s5, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s5)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(< hs1, hs2 >[c0]< hs1, hs2 >)
  diff.hs1.w(hs0[c0]hs0)
  diff.hs2.w(hs0[c0]hs0)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c1, c1)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c1, c1)
}

thm eceqoveq(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wb(wceq(cec(cop(c0, c3), c4), cec(cop(c2, c5), c4)), wceq(co(c0, c6, c5), co(c3, c6, c2))))
  -| wer(c4, cxp(c1, c1))
  -| wceq(cdm(c6), cxp(c1, c1))
  -| wn(wcel(emptycls, c1))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1)), c1))
  -| wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c5, c1))), wb(wbr(cop(c0, c3), c4, cop(c2, c5)), wceq(co(c0, c6, c5), co(c3, c6, c2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)

  -| diffsc(s0, c6)

  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)

  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wb(wceq(cec(cop(c0, c3), c4), cec(cop(c2, c5), c4)), wceq(co(c0, c6, c5), co(c3, c6, c2)))), diffsc(s0, c2))

  pm5.21ndd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(cec(cop(c0, c3), c4), cec(cop(c2, c5), c4)), wceq(co(c0, c6, c5), co(c3, c6, c2)), wcel(c5, c1))
  ex(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(cec(cop(c0, c3), c4), cec(cop(c2, c5), c4)), wcel(c5, c1))
  syl(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(cec(cop(c0, c3), c4), cec(cop(c2, c5), c4))), wcel(c5, c1), wcel(cop(c2, c5), cxp(c1, c1)))
  mpbid(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(cec(cop(c0, c3), c4), cec(cop(c2, c5), c4))), wcel(cop(c2, c5), cxp(c1, c1)), wcel(cop(c0, c3), cxp(c1, c1)))
  ad2antrr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wceq(cec(cop(c0, c3), c4), cec(cop(c2, c5), c4)), wcel(cop(c0, c3), cxp(c1, c1)))
  ereldm(cop(c0, c3), cxp(c1, c1), cop(c2, c5), c4, wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(cec(cop(c0, c3), c4), cec(cop(c2, c5), c4))))
  a1i(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(cec(cop(c0, c3), c4), cec(cop(c2, c5), c4))), wer(c4, cxp(c1, c1)))
  simpr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(cec(cop(c0, c3), c4), cec(cop(c2, c5), c4)))

  adantll(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wi(wceq(co(c0, c6, c5), co(c3, c6, c2)), wcel(c5, c1)))
  syl6com(wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(co(c0, c6, c5), co(c3, c6, c2)), wcel(c5, c1), wcel(co(c0, c6, c5), c1))
